metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000039 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple heap use after free bugs in the PDFparser could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, read memory, orcause a denial of service via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
